item.title: Hack The Box: MonitorsTwo
item.description: Overview Nmap Exploiting CVE-2022-46169 Container Enumeration Cracking Hashes Enumeration as Marcus Checking Out What is Running Rooting Containers Getting Root Intended Enumeration Path Overview Exploit cacti version 1.2.22 to get a shell inside a docker container Enumerate internal files to acess the database and find a hash for the user marcus Crack the blowfish hash with hashcat Ssh in as marcus Abuse CVE-2021-41091 to get root shell Nmap danp@local:~/Documents/HackTheBox/MonitorsTwo|â‡’ nmap -sV -sC 10.
